meta.title: Top Web and Mobile App Development Company | IT Services India

meta.content: What's your idea? You want the world to embrace your phenomenal ideas, products, and services. Trouble is, it's a challenge for you to do it alone. We are here to help.

link.script: { "@context": "https://schema.org", "@type": "Organization", "name": "Emperor Brains Infotech Limited", "alternateName": "Emperor Brains", "url": "https://www.Emperor Brains.com/", "logo": "https://d1i2cp4a5c819e.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/2018/12/Emperor Brains-black-top-logo.svg", "sameAs": [ "https://www.facebook.com/Emperor Brainsinfotechlimited", "https://www.instagram.com/Emperor Brains/", "https://www.linkedin.com/company/Emperor Brains", "https://twitter.com/Emperor Brains", "https://www.youtube.com/user/Emperor Brainsinfotech" ] }

meta.name: description
meta.content: We are a top web & mobile app development company in India & USA providing IT technology services & solutions to startups, enterprises and global brands.

script.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/5.4acec7cae206f0514b81.js.download

./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/night-mode-ic.svg
./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/light-mode-ic.svg

div.p: Define functional scope of your project to plan project budget and timeline.
Create your own agile squad with experienced members just like your local team.
We understand one size doesn't fit all. We can work with you to define and develop a custom solution that meets your needs.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/img-work-menu-brands-v3.png

a.p: A gallery of astonishing solutions delivered to the most recognized brands.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/img-work-menu-casestudy-v3.png

a.p: Explore how Emperor Brains delivered IT Solutions to Startups & Enterprises.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/img-work-menu-portfolio-v3.png

a.p: A glimpse to our expertise in design, development & industry experience.

div.p: Transforming ideas into a measurable scope with functional UI/UX Design.
Get to know how we balance the critical triangle of Cost, Time and Scope.
Form an expert team who works remotely, under your supervision.
Proactive review at every stage for the efficient delivery.

link.href: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/slick.css

div.span: Top Web and Mobile Apps Development Company

div.p: We deliver web and mobile app development services to global businesses since 1997, with 100% project delivery success. Hire the best programmers at affordable prices. Our design-focused approach and project execution processes help you to deliver the right solutions.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/home-page-banner-img.svg

div.style: width: 100000px; margin-left: 0px; animation: 74.6572s linear 0s infinite normal none running marqueeAnimation-47929140;

div.h2: Hire the Best Web and Mobile App Developers

p.p: Emperor Brains is a top web design agency and software development company with a large pool of software developers available for dedicated and fixed time/cost projects. Hire web developers from Emperor Brains who have proven expertise in trending web technologies like PHP, Laravel, Magento, ReactJS, front-end technologies like AngularJS and back-end technologies like Node.js to develop custom and responsive websites, web apps and eCommerce solutions.

Our Android app, iOS app and cross-platform mobile app developers are adroit in the latest mobile technologies and tools like Android Studio, Xcode, Kotlin, Xamarin, PhoneGap, React Native, etc. to build next-gen mobile applications.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/locker-close-icon.svg
./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/ic-new-process-discover.svg

div.p: We shape brands through exploration, applying in-depth research to challenge assumptions at every turn.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/ic-new-process-design.svg

div.p: Our design approach is to simplify. We embrace the joy in creating something unique that is easy for end users.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/ic-new-process-build.svg

div.p: Using modern technologies, we build with efficiency and skill, creating flexible and scalable business-driven solutions.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/ic-new-process-deliver.svg

div.p: We take an iterative approach to both our work and our practice, always looking for ways to improve what we do.

div.style: transform: translate3d(-2210px, 0px, 0px); transition: all 0s ease 0s; width: 8398px;

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-devops.svg

a.p: Our DevOps experts help you with secured & stable infrastructure management for Continuous integration and Continuous Delivery for faster releases.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-iot.svg

a.p: Hire IoT programmers who develop bespoke and innovative IoT solutions to simplify and automate complex business processes to save overall operational cost.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-gaming.svg

a.p: We’ve been renowned for delivering interactive, visually appealing and exciting gaming experiences on Mobile, Console, and Virtual Reality platforms.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-ai-ml.svg

a.p: We infuse AI elements to existing business processes to boost productivity. Our AI engineers are experts to deliver next-gen AI apps & solutions to diverse industries.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-qa.svg

a.p: Our QA engineers don’t just test, they make your software application successful ensuring quality delivery with expert manual and automated testing services.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/hire-dedicated-developer.svg

a.p: Create your own team of developers for your software development project on short term, long term or permanent basis with guaranteed project delivery at affordable prices.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-mobile-apps.svg

a.p: We build intuitive and engaging Android, iOS and cross-platform apps for businesses, consumers and enterprises that end users love and adapt to them very quickly.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-web-development.svg

a.p: Our web developers create custom web and web application solutions. We deliver web presence to help you grow your business using the best web technologies.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-ui-ux.svg

a.p: Starting from concept, information architecture, visual identity and UI/UX design, our team delivers dazzling experiences for maximum user engagement.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-devops.svg

a.p: Our DevOps experts help you with secured & stable infrastructure management for Continuous integration and Continuous Delivery for faster releases.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-iot.svg

a.p: Hire IoT programmers who develop bespoke and innovative IoT solutions to simplify and automate complex business processes to save overall operational cost.

a.p: We’ve been renowned for delivering interactive, visually appealing and exciting gaming experiences on Mobile, Console, and Virtual Reality platforms.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-ai-ml.svg

a.p: We infuse AI elements to existing business processes to boost productivity. Our AI engineers are experts to deliver next-gen AI apps & solutions to diverse industries.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-qa.svg

a.p: Our QA engineers don’t just test, they make your software application successful ensuring quality delivery with expert manual and automated testing services.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/hire-dedicated-developer.svg

a.p: Create your own team of developers for your software development project on short term, long term or permanent basis with guaranteed project delivery at affordable prices.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-mobile-apps.svg

a.p: We build intuitive and engaging Android, iOS and cross-platform apps for businesses, consumers and enterprises that end users love and adapt to them very quickly.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-web-development.svg

a.p: Our web developers create custom web and web application solutions. We deliver web presence to help you grow your business using the best web technologies.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-ui-ux.svg

a.p: Starting from concept, information architecture, visual identity and UI/UX design, our team delivers dazzling experiences for maximum user engagement.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/services-devops.svg

a.p: Our DevOps experts help you with secured & stable infrastructure management for Continuous integration and Continuous Delivery for faster releases.

div.p: Swiftjobs
div.h2: Simplifying your everyday job search and service hunt

div.h5: "I have high hopes to take this project forward and looking to develop phase-2 with Emperor Brains"

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/MikeL-v1.jpg
./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/cs_l_spotjobs-min.png

div.p: The Weed Tube
div.h2: Responsive video streaming platform with curated content

div.h5: " They left no stone unturned in turning my vision into reality. For real.”

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/ArendR-v1.jpg
./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/cs_l_the_weed_tube-min.png

div.p: Sparker
div.h2: A dating app that rewards when you actually meet!

div.h5: “This is pretty amazing. It looks great. Thank you everyone for creating such excellent interface”

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/DanielP-v1.jpg
./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/cs_l_sparker-min.png

p.p: When we mix organized Jugaad with our structural R&D and expertise, it can deliver commendable results that create value. All in all, Emperor Brains believes that Jugaad shouldn’t replace the structured approach to innovation but rather compliment it like bread & butter. It’s always about finding the right balance between top-down R&D vs bottom-up Jugaad innovation.

img.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/jugaad-video-poster-v2.webp

iframe.src: ./Top Web and Mobile App Development Company _ IT Services India_files/7n6xRIIc1I4.html

p.p: Have an idea? Work with us and see how it goes. We promise to go the extra mile for every project that we take onboard.
The first 7 days are on us with ZERO upfront investment.

div.p: COVID-19 Update

p.p: Amid the stress around pandemic of COVID-19, the team Emperor Brains is committed to providing uninterrupted services to all of our clients as well as ready to take up new assignments. All of our team members, including engineers, project managers, and business consulting teams are available during business hours and are safe working from home.
